code: @Test public void testLoopException() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:dead").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:loop").expectedMessageCount(1).     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             errorHandler(deadLetterChannel("mock:dead")).             from("direct:start").loop(3).to("mock:loop").throwException(new IllegalArgumentException("Forced")).end().to("mock:result").         }     }. }
